title: Cozy Bliss Cow Print Faux Fur Throw Blanket, Animal Printed Blankets Super Soft Warm Thick Fluffy Throws Home Decor for Couch Bed Sofa Women (Black&Brown Cow, 60x80 Inches)
description: Our faux fur blanket is crafted with 400GSM milky faux rabbit fur and 230GSM milky fleece, ensuring a soft and luxurious feel that rivals real fur. And have better resistance to fading and stain. No shedding. No pile up, No pile down. Cozy Bliss faux fur blanket is more thick, more cozy and luxurious than other fleece blanket.
